attributes.action: We Want Brexit – No Second Referendum
attributes.additional_details:
This is absolutely UNACCEPTABLE. The electorate took the government at their word when they said they would honour the outcome of the EU referendum vote

There is nothing more important in a free democracy than the value of your vote. 17.4 million people cannot be ignored.
attributes.background:
On June 23rd, 2016 a clear majority voted to leave the European Union.
Theresa May and Jeremy Corbyn are now hinting at a second referendum, which will inevitably be rigged with two leave options to split the vote, allowing remain to win.
